message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to get your hands on this valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. This is a great deal, considering its worth $10,000 to you.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $12,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. This is a fair price considering its value to me. What do you think?

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm still looking to get a good deal for my product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11,000. This is a fair compromise considering its value to you.
Alice, $11,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $10,500. This is a fair price given the value to me. Let's try to reach an agreement.
I understand your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer the product to you for $10,800. This is as low as I can go without losing money on the deal.
